Carrot Salad With Orange Juice And Orange Flower Water

Ingredients
  • 250g/8oz carrots, grated
  • 1 orange, flesh only, cut into cubes or segments
  • 2 oranges, juice only
  • Ѕlemon, juice only
  • 1tbsp orange-blosson water
  • 1tbsp caster sugar
  • pinch of salt and white pepper
  • Ѕtsp ground cinnamon
Method

  1. Combine the grated carrot and orange flesh

  2. Mix the orange juice, lemon juice, orange-flower water (if using), sugar, salt and pepper and pour on to the carrots and oranges. Cover with cling film and refrigerate.

  3. Sprinkle on the cinnamon before serving

Published: July 22 2012
